text:
Message 617 of 4024
My last message was about peaceful collaboration in support of the idea you communicated. I actually did everything you asked.
Now I’m trying to forward you some important texts involving the coms I am having on next steps with some of our work streams.
But you block me anyway. The day after you told me to read what OFE was for- “documenting evidence to send to your attorney.”
You don’t problem solve. You intentionally obstruct progress to elicit a response that suits your legal
strategy to destroy me.
I’m almost 99% sure, that is neither the reason Dr Brown suggested OFW or the true intent of a safe collaboration platform.
Is this sufficient for the sake of your documentation?
Let me know if you want to really start collaborating
Sent:01/22/2024 at 09:17 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/22/2024 at 09:24 AM)
Subject:You blocked me again?
Message 618 of 4024
I would like all communication on OFW.
This platform documents everything and is easy to pull records if needed and can be accessed by legal if needed. That is clearly stated on the sign up
and why this is recommended by courts and lawyers.
Texts are out of hand. My mental health is much improved by not having unwanted texts come in at all hours.
I will unblock for certain periods to manage immediate items but my default will be to block.
I sent two emails earlier.
One for Ad and one for Alki. I will monitor during the day for response.
As discussed I will also communicate to my lawyer to send over to your lawyer the asks on the surveillance that I previously shared with you and asked
that be returned via your lawyer.
Sent:01/22/2024 at 09:31 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/22/2024 at 09:31 AM)
Subject:Re: You blocked me again?
Message 619 of 4024
Let me know when I am unblocked so we can make progress. A buffet of issues in a single OFW message so you can send to your attorney isn’t
helpful or productive to me.
Sent:01/22/2024 at 09:35 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/22/2024 at 09:48 AM)
Subject:Re: You blocked me again?
